summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6035 for the improvement of Bright Street from 8th Avenue Northwest to approximately 10 feet west thereof; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 81942, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
